text: Star Jones in February. ( Photo : Bryan Bedder, Getty Images for Woman's Day ) Congratulations are in order to former TV personality Star Jones, who married her fiancé Ricardo Lugo on Sunday. Jones shared several peeks of the Royal Caribbean cruise that hosted the ceremony, as well as her 56th birthday celebrations, on Instagram. ` ` Yesterday was my birthday... and today is our wedding day at sea! Our # AnthemToLove has officially begun on the # AnthemOfTheSeas,'' she wrote, referencing the cruise ship on which the happy couple was married. Jones got engaged last year to the attorney, and regularly shows off their relationship on social media. “ There appears to be a heatwave going across the Midwest, ” she wrote
